data.text: @AFP @songpinganq When Government's like China Treat their OWN people like dogs One has to wonder WHY THE HELL DO WE BUY ANY DAM THING FROM THEM! sad to think how HUMANS are treated there, WE CAN MAKE AND PRODUCE OUR OWN!
@kevintsang2019 @AFP they don’t do it for anyone’s health. China’s “help” is like government’s “help”. best to be avoided.

@AFP Very true that it’s about uncertainty over the rules, not the outbreak itself. People know they could only help themselves in this chaotic time instead of rely on Hong Kong government, as their plan is just adding burden to the strained healthcare system.

@AFP @tvidjka From Asia's World City 
To Asia's Third World City 
In just 25 years! 

Thanks CCP!

@AFP Look at Singapore...

It's quite ironic that hk gov keep creating chaos and anxiety in this society...

@AFP #CCPChina stupid policies have made #HongKong become a fallen city

#StandWithHongKong
@AFP Shame on Hong Kong. Wish HKers watch more Ukraine news to realise what a bunch of cowardly losers you are. Sadly a large city populated by a bunch of villagers #HongKong
@AFP @MrAfraidOfMouse Of course they are "helping"... The quality is shit and the price is crazy

@AFP No one trust Hongkong dictatorship 

Dictatorship destroyed Hongkong medical, freedom and human rights
